amendment.description: Amendment shortens from 15 to 6 months, the length of time the FCC will have to promulgate rules for implementation of the checklist provisions of the bill; and reduces the time span that a Bell company must operate their long distance service through a separate subsidiary from 3 years to 18 months.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed inte House Report 104-223, designated as No. 1-1, to shorten from 15 to 6 months, the length of time the FCC would have to promulgate rules for implementation of the checklist provisions of the bill; and reduces the time span that a bell company must operate their long distance service through a separate subsidiary from 3 year to 18 months.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bliley amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 256 - 149 (Roll no. 627).
